title: FCC registration program
text:
In <a href="telecommunication">telecommunication</a>, FCC registration program is the <a href="Federal%20Communications%20Commission">Federal Communications Commission</a> (FCC) program and associated directives intended to assure that all connected <a href="terminal%20equipment">terminal equipment</a> and protective circuitry will not harm the <a href="public%20switched%20telephone%20network">public switched telephone network</a> or certain <a href="private%20line">private line</a> services. 
"Note 1:" The FCC registration program requires the registering of terminal equipment and protective circuitry in accordance with Subpart C of <a href="part%2068">part 68</a>, Title 47 of the "Code of Federal Regulations." This includes the assignment of identification numbers to the equipment and the testing of the equipment. 
"Note 2:" The FCC registration program contains no requirement that accepted terminal equipment be compatible with, or function with, the network.
